## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G17090](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G17090)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>PP2C.D2</u>
- **Gene Name:** D-CLADE TYPE 2C PROTEIN PHOSPHATASE 2
- **Description:**   Protein phosphatase 2C family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2086097
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
